mapper.sql: id, screening_notice_id, district_id, accept_org_id, screening_task_plan_id, operation_status, operator_id, create_time
mapper.select: select msn.* from m_screening_notice msn inner join m_screening_notice_dept_org msndo on msndo.screening_notice_id = msn.id where type = #{type} and accept_org_id = #{acceptOrgId}

SELECT msn.id, msn.type, msn.title, msn.content, msn.start_time, msn.end_time, msn.release_time, msn.screening_task_id, msn.operator_id, msn.screening_type, msn.create_time, msn.release_status, msn.create_user_id, msn.gov_dept_id, msndo.id as screening_notice_dept_org_id, msndo.district_id, msndo.accept_org_id, msndo.screening_task_plan_id, msndo.operation_status, msndo.create_time as accept_time FROM m_screening_notice_dept_org msndo LEFT JOIN m_screening_notice msn ON msndo.screening_notice_id = msn.id
msn.`type` = 1 and msndo.`accept_org_id` = #{orgId} and msn.screening_type = 0 and msndo.operation_status = 0
order by msn.create_time desc limit 4
